snippet: The Museum of Fine Arts, Houston is planning a new building on a two-acre site.
abstract: The Museum of Fine Arts, Houston is planning a new building on a two-acre site.
lead_paragraph: The Museum of Fine Arts, Houston has selected Steven Holl Architects to design an expansion that will primarily hold galleries for art after 1900, the museum has announced. The project will also integrate the museum's sculpture garden, expand its art school and add a new parking area.

headline.main: Houston Museum Chooses Architect for Expansion Plan
